reviewText: You kinda know a script is pretty good when viewers talk to film.... This was one of them..., some of the actors could've used some upgrading.,

There is a lesson to be given from this movie. Always tell the truth about yourself even if you might possibly loose that which you're aiming for because things that are done in the dark always come into the light. We all have some skeletons in the closet but learn to forgive because nobody is perfect.

This was a very entertaining film. The acting, plot and direction were fine. The story really made me think about forgiveness and the true meaning of love. The two main characters were very interesting. I really felt for Simee. She went through a lot to become famous and now her past threatened to destroy her relationship with her new boyfriend. Everyone has to ask themselves will they be able to forgive and forget about a past indiscretion?  This film made me think about Kanye and Kim. This film would be rated R for at least six F-bombs and several B-words. There is no, sex, nudity or graphic violence. This is a great date movie. Better than most date movies that I've seen because it will make you think about your relationship. Mark Harris is an excellent writer and director and I look forward to his next project. Highly recommended.
Nice movie. Good cast and great story line.  Mel Rob is talented in many areas and should be recognized for is efforts.
Empty and full at the same time
It a part of life some of us live.
Thoughtful movie! I could not guess how it would end and appreciated the fact that the movie was layered.
Touching, sweet, and simple love story.  Acting or actors could have been better.

loved it---loved the character and how she tried to change her life
There is a scene that is what a direct communication to another's souls is and it came across in this film. I'll re-watch it just for that moment.

Its a small independent movie but the production value is solid! You will see a familiar face in a comedian and regular on The Carmichael Show. Acting is good,writing is solid. This is why you watch indies. Alot of indies are poorly done but this film doesn't use a low budget as an excuse.
Enjoyed this movie and the ending.  We all need to do some atonement of our own!!!

Kind of cute! A little preachy after the 1 hour mark, but still, well written and interesting story line. A bigger budget might have allowed for better sound quality, but still, watched the whole movie, so it wasn't bad.
That dude knows nothing about forgiveness, and he too have secrets himself murdered that man in the yard so why don't he admit his flaws too?
